platinum.name: Workstate
platinum.description: Workstate is a global IT consulting company providing Nearshore and US-based development teams in long-term client partnerships. Our 25+ years of experience offers a superior alternative to staffing. Workstate’s mission to create the best home for the brightest technology talent. Our teams drive success by working closely with our clients.

gold.name: CGI
gold.description: Founded in 1976, CGI is among the largest IT and business consulting services firms in the world. We are insights-driven and outcomes-based to help accelerate returns on your investments.

gold.name: OCLC
gold.description: At OCLC, we exist because what is known must be shared. OCLC makes the technology that powers the world's libraries, and if that seems low-tech, you haven't visited a library lately. We challenge your mind while keeping your heart.

gold.name: Com Resource
gold.description: Having delivered strategic IT solutions for over 25 years, we are problem-solvers by nature. More than 200 of us…and growing. Customizing processes and technology are our specialties. The more complicated the IT challenge, the better.

gold.name: IGS
gold.description: IGS Energy is a leading energy supplier located in the local Columbus area.

silver.name: Revel IT
silver.description: Revel IT is an IT staffing company based in Dublin, Ohio. It specializes in staffing IT professionals for companies of all sizes and providing IT solutions.

bronze.name: g2o
bronze.description: G2O solves complex problems with tailored customer experience solutions that create tangible outcomes, through innovative technologies, data integration, CX research and strategy, product management and talent infusion.
